page.title: 01 MAIDSTONE (NORTH)
page.content: The area northwards from the centre of{Maidstone}is varied and contains{commercial, residential, {agricultural and industrial}zones which are interlinked by the major lines of{communications}- the A20, the M20,the main railway to London and, of course the{River Medway.} The recent rapid growth of the residential areas has been aided by the easy{commuting}afforded from this area. The northern part of the town centre is highly commercialised and there is an out-of-town shopping centre at Allington (7556) near the A20/M20.The area has many attractive features,too, like{Allington } {Castle,The Friars and the Malta Inn}on the River Medway itself.
